title: Featured jobs this week at Arcanum, Spacesmith, Sage and Coombe, and The Archers
author: Nathaniel Bahadursingh
excerpt: Take a look at our latest curated selection of architecture and design firms currently hiring on Archinect Jobs: This week's featured employer highlight includes job openings in New York City, Los Angeles, and San Francisco. For even more opportunities...
text: Take a look at our latest curated selection of architecture and design firms currently hiring on Archinect Jobs: This week's featured employer highlight includes job openings in New York City, Los Angeles, and San Francisco. For even more opportunities, visit the Archinect job board and explore our active community of job seekers, firms, and schools. In New York City, Sage and Coombe Architects is hiring for a Project Architect with six to eight years of experience. Strong candidates will be proficient with Revit, Rhino, Enscape, and Adobe Creative Suite, along with a knowledge of building codes, standards, and architectural building systems. Applicants should also possess the ability to  take a leadership role on projects from initial concept through construction administration. Ocean Breeze Indoor Athletic Facility by Sage and Coombe Architects.San Francisco-based firm Arcanum Architecture has an opening for an Architect / Designer Project Manager - Residential with seven-plus years of experience, primarily in high-end custom residential projects. One should be proficient with AutoCAD, Archicad (or Revit), and SketchUp, in addition to having a thorough knowledge of CRC standards, design, and detailing in Type V construction. Candidates must also have excellent  verbal, written, and graphic communication skills. Redwood Grove by Arcanum Architecture.Spacesmith has four exciting job opportunities available in New York City: a Senior Architect/Designer with eight-plus years of experience, an Intermediate Architect/Designer with four-plus years of experience, a Project Manager with ten-plus years of experience, and a Marketing and Communications Coordinator with at least three years of experience. The Senior Architect/Designer, Intermediate Architect/Designer, and Project Manager should be experienced eith Revit, BIM 360, Adobe Creative Suite, and Bluebeam. The Marketing and Communications Coordinator should be proficient with InDesign and Microsoft Office Suite. Carnegie Mellon University Alan Magee Scaife Hall of Engineering by Spacesmith.Los Angeles-based practice The Archers is seeking an Intermediate Interior Designer with four-plus years of experience and skills with Rhino, AutoCAD, Adobe Creative Suite, and Excel. Strong applicants will have experience working on high-end residential and commercial projects, the ability to multitask, and experience communicating with clients and wider project teams. One should also be able to work independently, as well as in a team. Take Five for Artek + Heath by The Archers. Photo: Eric PetschekIf you don't already, follow Archinect on Instagram, Facebook, X, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Threads, and BlueSky, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Instagram, Facebook, X, and Threads feeds.
html:
Take a look at our latest curated selection of architecture and design firms currently hiring on Archinect Jobs: This week's featured employer highlight includes job openings in New York City, Los Angeles, and San Francisco.

For even more opportunities, visit the Archinect job board and explore our active community of job seekers, firms, and schools.

In New York City, Sage and Coombe Architects is hiring for a Project Architect with six to eight years of experience. Strong candidates will be proficient with Revit, Rhino, Enscape, and Adobe Creative Suite, along with a knowledge of building codes, standards, and architectural building systems. Applicants should also possess the ability to  take a leadership role on projects from initial concept through construction administration.

San Francisco-based firm Arcanum Architecture has an opening for an Architect / Designer Project Manager - Residential with seven-plus years of experience, primarily in high-end custom residential projects. One should be proficient with AutoCAD, Archicad (or Revit), and SketchUp, in addition to having a thorough knowledge of CRC standards, design, and detailing in Type V construction. Candidates must also have excellent  verbal, written, and graphic communication skills.

Spacesmith has four exciting job opportunities available in New York City: a Senior Architect/Designer with eight-plus years of experience, an Intermediate Architect/Designer with four-plus years of experience, a Project Manager with ten-plus years of experience, and a Marketing and Communications Coordinator with at least three years of experience. The Senior Architect/Designer, Intermediate Architect/Designer, and Project Manager should be experienced eith Revit, BIM 360, Adobe Creative Suite, and Bluebeam. The Marketing and Communications Coordinator should be proficient with InDesign and Microsoft Office Suite.

Los Angeles-based practice The Archers is seeking an Intermediate Interior Designer with four-plus years of experience and skills with Rhino, AutoCAD, Adobe Creative Suite, and Excel. Strong applicants will have experience working on high-end residential and commercial projects, the ability to multitask, and experience communicating with clients and wider project teams. One should also be able to work independently, as well as in a team.

If you don't already, follow Archinect on Instagram, Facebook, X, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Threads, and BlueSky, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Instagram, Facebook, X, and Threads feeds.
